entry.title: UniFi LTE 6.6.22
entry.summary:
Overview UniFi LTE 6.6.22 includes the improvements listed below. Improvements
Added an indication to the screen when the device is in TFTP Recovery mode. Improved device stability Improved default APN settings.
Additional information
Update your devices by changing the Device Firmware Release Channel in the UniFi Network application to Release Candidate. If you wish to go back to the Official release after the upgrade, change the release channel back to Official.
If you encounter any issues with this release, please provide us some details on your setup and include the below information:
U-LTE model(s) Previous LTE release version UniFi Network application version

entry.title: UniFi Access Point 6.5.66
entry.summary:
Overview UniFi Access Point 6.5.66 includes the bugfix listed below. It's only available for Gen2, Gen3 and Gen6 Access Points. Bugfixes
Fixed APs with wired uplinks sometimes needing a power cycle to recover from meshing with each other during a USW/Console firmware update.
Additional information
Refer to the Help Center article here to determine the UniFi Access Point generation.
If you encounter any issues with this release, please provide us with some details on your setup and include the below information:
AP model(s) Previous AP release version UniFi Network application version

entry.title: UniFi Access Point 6.5.67
entry.summary:
Overview UniFi Access Point 6.5.67 includes the bugfix listed below. It's only available for Gen4 and Gen5 Access Points. Bugfixes
Fixed APs with wired uplinks sometimes needing a power cycle to recover from meshing with each other during a USW/Console firmware update.
Additional information
Refer to the Help Center article here to determine the UniFi Access Point generation.
If you encounter any issues with this release, please provide us with some details on your setup and include the below information:
AP model(s) Previous AP release version UniFi Network application version
